title: Modified Profile Schema
description: Schema for modifiedprofile.json files containing profile swaps applied by options

OptionId.description: ID of the option that triggers this modification. Just types ModifyItemOnSingle, ModifyItemOnAll o ModifyItemOnBasic

ProfileId.description: ID of the original profile being modified

UnitId.description: ID of the unit being affected by this profile modification

ReferencedItemsToRemove.description: Object mapping Items IDs to remove at certain level (statlines, rules, equipment ..)

oneOf.description: Direct reference to an item ID with additional info.
Nested references for items within a specific context

ReferencedItemsToAdd.description: Object mapping Items IDs to add at certain level (statlines, rules, equipment ..)

oneOf.description: Direct reference to an item ID with additional info.
Nested references for items within a specific context
